data.title: Actor Michael C. Hall weds Morgan Macgregor in New York City
data.meta_description: LOS ANGELES (AP)  Michael C. Hall is a newlywed.A spokesman for Hall says the former “Dexter” star married writer Morgan Macgregor on Monday morning at New York City Hall. Publici…
data.text:
LOS ANGELES (AP)  Michael C. Hall is a newlywed.

A spokesman for Hall says the former “Dexter” star married writer Morgan Macgregor on Monday morning at New York City Hall. Publicist Craig Bankey released no other details.

Hall and Macgregor first appeared publicly as a couple in 2012.

Hall has been performing onstage in New York stage since wrapping “Dexter” in 2013. Macgregor is a Los Angeles-based book critic.

This is the 45-year-old actor”s third marriage. He was previously wed to actresses Amy Spanger and Jennifer Carpenter.
